reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress classy and flattering, particularly noting how it accentuates curves in all the right places. The material receives positive feedback for its athletic-like feel and thickness, while customers appreciate its comfort and stretchiness. The fit and length receive mixed reviews - while some find the length perfect, others say it's too short. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy and comfortable
items.body: I typically wear a large and I purchased the medium because I wanted a snug fit in the chest. It was exactly as expected. Material is stretchy and with a tight fit you don’t need a bra. Short but not too short so it looks classy. Big chested girls, you will love this dress on! I’m as 34DDD 175lbs 5’6” Read more
items.author: Jessica Walker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You need this!! It’s so cute
items.body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: This dress is amazing! It fits like a dream! Its buttery soft, It’s not too short, has great support. I’m a 32G and could wear this without a bra and just cakes to cover! I’m 5’5” and weigh 168 and I got a medium for better compression! The ruching at the waist/ tummy area is SO flattering! I need it in every color! I do wish it had shorts but I wore a pair of my biker shorts under so I didn’t flash anyone haha . I wore it to work with a denim jacket and it was adorable! I’m bummed I don’t have a photo of me wearing it! I need to do something about that! Read more
items.author: ShariBabeeee

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty nice dress good for any occasion or normal wear<3
items.body: The media could not be loaded. The dress was really nice particularly when I first put it on. I did notice that it looked a little funny because I was short for reference. I am 4’11 to 5’10 and unfortunately, when I first put it on it just kinda looked a little funny on me, but after a while, I paired it with some heels and it did come out very nice. I liked the fabric of the dress. It feels a little soft and silky not too harsh kind of like what you would think shape wear would feel like and I absolutely love square cut out so obviously that was a bigger plus for me. Overall, the dress is pretty nice if you want something cute and simple. I say get it. It is a bit basic for my taste, but I believe that you could spice this thing up with some styling and make it whatever you want it to be honestly to mention the weight of the dress it was actually pretty light, not too heavy at all and then it isn’t see-through at all so you wouldn’t have to worry about that Read more
items.author: Salt bab

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylist and comfy
items.body: This purple activewear dress is one of my new favorites! I wore it to Disney and it was perfect for a long day of walking around the park. The material is soft, stretchy, and breathable, so I stayed comfortable even in the heat. The fit is really flattering and the color is gorgeous; I got compliments on it all day. It’s stylish enough to look cute in photos but also practical enough to handle a full day of activity. Honestly, this dress is the perfect mix of comfort and style, and I’ll definitely be wearing it again for both casual days out and trips where I need something easy and reliable. Read more
items.author: keitha

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and very comfortable
items.body: This dress is cute and very comfortable. Nice quality. Didn’t shrink after washing. The fabric is light weight. It’s a spandex like material so it is form fitting and the material is quick dry. Not see through at all. The cut is a square neck so finding the right bra style was a little challenging for me. Other than that, I love this outfit. Purchased in pink and black. Great value for cost. I would definitely purchase again in other colors too. Read more
items.author: Jasmine P

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy and Cute
items.body: 5’ 7”, Purchased an XL, 200lbs, Pear Shaped Pros Fabric: I wore this on a date and it allowed for a good amount of expansion as I was eating without feeling overly constricted. The fabric provided good coverage, it was soft and stretchy. Neckline; Square necklines are very flattering and it creates a great highlight for the décolletage. ***If you are interested in layering, the neckline would also suit a button down underneath or another shirt for extra visual appeal/ styling. Since it is a very simplistic dress, you fancy also dress up the look easily with a pair of heels, perhaps a blazer/sweater and great accessories. Style: A line dresses provide a very universal look that looks great with so many different body types. The A line allows for the bottom half of the dress to glide across the thigh without appearing snug. Cons Length: I am 5’7” with a pear shaped physique, short waisted, have long legs and a large derrière. Due to this, the length was much too short in the back and the waist was a little too long since I am so short waisted. ***I loved the length in the front so I just added a longer cardigan to deal with the lack of length in the back. You can certainly pair it with a cardigan or blazer (fitted or oversized) Sizing: Although I love the stretchiness of the fabric, I feel like the bodice area around the midsection is smaller than the rest of the bodice. Although there is some forgiveness for the stomach due to the ruching in the fabric, the tightness around the midsection left a bit to be desired. I was able to move the ruching around to not make it so obvious but it was just ok. I actually sized up for this dress and it still felt like the bust area was bigger than the area around the midsection. Read more
items.author: Shopping Queen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars blue dress but it's gray.
items.body: The dress is beautiful, well-priced and of good quality. The fabric is light and airy, and it's not transparent. It fits very nicely against the body. The only thing is that it's not true to the color shown in the photo. I bought it in blue, but it's actually gray. Nevertheless, I recommend it. Read more
items.author: Grisela

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars New favorite dress!
items.body: This dress is everything! It’s form-fitting at the top, flowy at the hips, and insanely comfortable. The stretch is amazing, and I get so many compliments every time I wear it. I would order this again and again—such a perfect, easy, flattering outfit! Read more
items.author: Emily Boren

short_description:
Womens Dress Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Pea Green, Pink, White, Blue, Purple, Yellow, Black, Water Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
